body:
@apaszke Thanks for your answer. However, when I try @magzHL's  code snippet using the master branch  I get
```
RuntimeError: element 0 of variables does not require grad and does not have a grad_fn
```
It seems that the `grad_fn` attribute is not set when calling functions inside `.backward()`?
As I said, it works for me under 0.3.1 using CPU mode, but not when using CUDA.
